abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32483288, pmid32482123, pmid32476285, pmid32478559, pmid32469400, pmid32471884, pmid32472672, pmid32484915, pmid32472675, pmid32482155, pmid32481773, pmid32471002, pmid32472653, pmid32482087, pmid32472683, pmid32484990, pmid32469246, pmid32471003, pmid32472679, pmid32478606, pmid32483311, pmid32472685, pmid32472459, pmid32482888, pmid32472676, pmid32484683, pmid32482633, pmid32471893, pmid32484156, pmid32472043, pmid32494927, pmid32484130, pmid32476305, pmid32483523, pmid32472684, pmid32493788, pmid32483314, pmid32492200, pmid32492295, pmid32484418, pmid32484227, pmid32483084, pmid32469989, pmid32472681
